t: How do I shop with points on Amazon? – Bilt Rewards Support
s: Under Your Enrolled Rewards Accounts you will likely see your former Bilt Mastercard®. Click the down arrow and click Unenroll next to Manage Account · Click Enroll a new rewards account, input your card information, and click Add your card · Select whether you want to apply points by default ...

t: Bilt Rewards adds Amazon redemptions, new promotion - The Points Guy
s: August 26, 2024 - Bilt Rewards members can now spend points on Amazon. Earn bonus points when you link your accounts and spend at least 1 point.

t: How to Use Credit Card Points to Shop on Amazon - NerdWallet
s: December 20, 2024 - American Express also offers cash-back credit cards (aka, those that earn Reward Dollars, instead of Membership Rewards). And if you have an eligible AmEx cash back card, you can redeem those Reward Dollars on Amazon at a 1:1 rate. That is, 1 Reward Dollar = $1 at Amazon.com.
